Text: Thanks for this one. Can som one seed Metal-Hard Rock Covers 81. Its missing for me!

Dear Biomechanical,
I think I speak for all of those who are regularly dieing to get your issue of great (and not so great) metal covers.

Please, can you give us those songs in VBR (variable bitrate) quality?

It would make your great job even so much greater.


Thanks.
I will do my best!!! Those I can get in VBR, I'll post in that format
